name: DisconnectAFK
description: Automatically disconnect people who go AFK. This requires a AFK channel to be set.

name: prefix
description: The bot's prefix. This is '.' by default. In the command: .config the '.' is the prefix.

name: swearFilter
description: A different solution to profanity in your server!

name: listGuilds
description: List this guild in the guilds command.

name: listGuildsInvite
description: Show a invite to this guild in the guilds commands
